Container.Name: Kometa Overlay Reset

Branch.TagDescription: Latest Stable Kometa Overlay Reset Release
Development Releases for Kometa Overlay Reset

Container.Overview: Kometa Overlay Reset is a Python tool created to remove all overlays applied to a Plex library by Kometa, using methods that are not available within Kometa itself. It's typically needed when the original backup posters used by Kometa to remove overlays have been lost.

Config.Name: Plex URL (--url)
Config.Description: Plex URL of the Server you want to connect to.

Config.Name: Plex Token (--token)
Config.Description: Plex Token of the Server you want to connect to.

Config.Name: Plex Library (--library)
Config.Description: Name of the Plex Library you want to reset.

Config.Name: Kometa Asset Folder
Config.Description: Kometa Asset Folder to Scan for restoring posters.

Config.Name: Kometa Asset Folder (--asset)
Config.Description: Can set the Kometa Asset Folder if its not mapped to /asset.

Config.Name: Kometa Original Folder
Config.Description: Kometa Original Folder to Scan for restoring posters.

Config.Name: Kometa Original Folder (--original)
Config.Description: Can set the Kometa Original Folder if its not mapped to /original.

Config.Name: TMDb V3 API Key (--tmdbapi)
Config.Description: TMDb V3 API Key for restoring posters from TMDb.

Config.Name: Start From (--start)
Config.Description: Plex Item Title to Start restoring posters from.

Config.Name: Items (--items)
Config.Description: Restore specific Plex Items by Title. Can use a bar-separated (|) list.

Config.Name: Labels (--labels)
Config.Description: Additional labels to remove. Can use a bar-separated (|) list.

Config.Name: Timeout (--timeout)
Config.Description: Connection Timeout in seconds that's greater than 0.

Config.Name: Dry Run (--dry)
Config.Description: Run as a Dry Run without making changes in Plex.

Config.Name: Flat Assets (--flat)
Config.Description: Kometa Asset Folder uses Flat Assets Image Paths. https://kometa.wiki/en/latest/home/guides/assets.html#asset-naming

Config.Name: Reset Main Posters (--no-main)
Config.Description: Do not restore Main Show/Movie posters during run.

Config.Name: Reset Season Posters (--season)
Config.Description: Restore Season posters during run.

Config.Name: Reset Episode Posters (--episode)
Config.Description: Restore Episode posters during run.

Config.Name: Ignore Automatic Resume (--ignore-resume)
Config.Description: Ignores the automatic resume.

Config.Name: Trace (--trace)
Config.Description: Run with extra trace logs.

Config.Name: Log Requests (--log-requests)
Config.Description: Run with every request and file action logged.
